trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表一組相關的項目中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Unloads the container for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 卸載指定的項目容器。

trans-unit.source: This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可復原的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the gallery category distributes all its available width equally between its columns.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出組件庫類別目錄會發佈其資料行之間的平均其可用寬度。

trans-unit.source: The ColumnsStretchToFill property only has an effect when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ColumnsStretchToFill 屬性才會有作用時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the gallery category distributes its available width equally between its columns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果組件庫類別目錄會發佈其資料行; 之間的平均可用寬度否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.ColumnsStretchToFill*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.ColumnsStretchToFill*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> for the ribbon gallery header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>功能區圖庫標頭。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the visibility of the header.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定標頭的可見度。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否指定的項目是 （或可以成為） 其本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: The item to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定這個組件庫類別目錄是否會定義使用統一的項目配置的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> event and adds an event listener to listen for currency changes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> for the category.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>事件，並將事件接聽程式接聽貨幣變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>分類。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 時叫用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.target: 變更的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property changes.

trans-unit.target: 準備指定的項目，以顯示指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目項目。

trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Receives events from the centralized event manager.
trans-unit.target: 從集中式的事件管理員接收事件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>介面。</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory>

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref>呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 產生事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果接聽程式處理此事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it receives an event that it does not recognize or handle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果收到不會在無法辨識或不處理的事件。
